bill.summary:
Stop Swatting in Our Schools Act of 2016
This bill directs the Federal Bureau of Investigation to create a task force to combat swatting.
It defines swatting as an activity that uses the mail, telephone, or another instrument of interstate or foreign commerce to willfully make a threat or maliciously and knowingly convey false information with the intent to trigger an emergency law enforcement response.
